post:
Why MicroNetvps.com?

  1. MicroNet has been established since 1999.
  2. SolusVM for your control panel, easily restart your VPS, change your root password, reload a new OS and see your usage!
  3. Choose from over 30 images for your Operating System! We support all major versions of CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora Core, OpenSUSE and Scientific.
  4. Premium Data Centers Choose from USA, UK, Russia, Turkey, India or Switzerland!
  5. TUN/TAP Enabled (NAT Module Enabled as well).
  6. 24/7 UK Based Support.
  7. Fast High Grade Servers with RAID protected enterprise drives.
  8. OpenVZ.
  9. Instant + Automatic Activation.
  10. Not Oversold (In fact, We undersell our servers and always keep them at 60% allocated Capacity to ensure quality and reliability for our customers).

MicroNetVPS now offers VPS in 6 different locations:

  1. USA - North Carolina - starting from $5.59 with 20% recurring promotion.
  2. UK - Kent - starting from $6.60 with 20% recurring promotion.
  3. Turkey - Istanbul - starting from $6.60 with 20% recurring promotion.
  4. Russia - Moscow - starting from $6.60 with 20% recurring promotion.
  5. India - Hyderabad - starting from $7.40 with 20% recurring promotion.
  6. Switzerland - Zurich - starting from $7.40 with 20% recurring promotion.

Payment Methods
  1. Paypal
  2. Liberty Reserve
  3. Skrill (formerly Moneybookers)
  4. Bitcoin
